moves.name: After You
moves.description: The target will attack immediately after the user in the same turn.

moves.name: Amnesia
moves.description: Boosts Special Defense by 2 stages.

moves.name: Aromatherapy
moves.description: Cures status on the user's team.

moves.name: Attract
moves.description: Targets of the opposite gender are infatuated and have a 50% chance to do nothing.

moves.name: Belly Drum
moves.description: User loses 50% of max HP. Maximizes Attack.

moves.name: Bestow
moves.description: User passes its held item to the target.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.description: 10% chance to freeze.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.description: 30% chance to paralyze.

moves.name: Bounce
moves.description: User is made invulnerable for one turn, then hits the next turn. 30% chance to paralyze.

moves.name: Brick Break
moves.description: Destroys Light Screen and Reflect, then hits.

moves.name: Calm Mind
moves.description: Boosts Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.

moves.name: Captivate
moves.description: Lowers an opposite gender foe's Special Attack by 2 stages.

moves.name: Charge Beam
moves.description: 70% chance to boost Special Attack by 1 stage.

moves.name: Charm
moves.description: Lowers foe's Attack by 2 stages.

moves.name: Confide
moves.description: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.

moves.name: Copycat
moves.description: Uses the last move used in the battle.

moves.name: Cosmic Power
moves.description: Boosts Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.

moves.name: Counter
moves.description: If hit by a physical attack, returns double the damage.

moves.name: Covet
moves.description: Steals target's item.

moves.name: Dazzling Gleam
moves.description: Deals damage to all adjacent foes.

moves.name: Defense Curl
moves.description: Boosts Defense by 1 stage.

moves.name: Dig
moves.description: User is made invulnerable for one turn, then hits the next turn.

moves.name: Disarming Voice
moves.description: This attack never misses.

moves.name: Double Slap
moves.description: Hits 2-5 times in 1 turn.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.description: Boosts evasion by 1 stage.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.description: Has 1/3 recoil.

moves.name: Drain Punch
moves.description: Leeches 50% damage.

moves.name: Dream Eater
moves.description: Leeches 50% of the damage dealt. Only works if target is asleep.

moves.name: Dynamic Punch
moves.description: Confuses the foe.

moves.name: Echoed Voice
moves.description: Power increases when used consecutively.

moves.name: Encore
moves.description: Causes the target to repeat the last move for 2-5 turns.

moves.name: Endeavor
moves.description: Lowers the target's HP to the user's HP.

moves.name: Endure
moves.description: The user always survives with at least 1 HP.

moves.name: Facade
moves.description: Has 140 Base Power when burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

moves.name: Fake Tears
moves.description: Lowers Special Defense by 2 stages.

moves.name: Fire Blast
moves.description: 10% chance to burn.

moves.name: Fire Punch
moves.description: 10% chance to burn.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.description: 10% chance to burn.

moves.name: Flash
moves.description: Lowers foe's accuracy 1 stage.

moves.name: Fling
moves.description: Throws the user's hold item at the foe. Power and effect depend on the item.

moves.name: Focus Punch
moves.description: Fails if the user takes damage before it hits.

moves.name: Follow Me
moves.description: All moves target the user.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.description: No additional effect.

moves.name: Grass Knot
moves.description: Deals damage based on the foe's weight.

moves.name: Gravity
moves.description: For 5 turns, prevents flying or jumping; also disables Ground immunities.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: Lowers target's Attack by 1 stage.

moves.name: Headbutt
moves.description: 30% chance to flinch the target.

moves.name: Heal Bell
moves.description: Cures status on the user's team.

moves.name: Heal Pulse
moves.description: Heals the target by 50% its max HP.

moves.name: Healing Wish
moves.description: KOs the user and heals the next Pokemon in.

moves.name: Helping Hand
moves.description: Increases power of ally's moves by 50%.

moves.name: Hidden Power Bug
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Dark
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Dragon
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Electric
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Fighting
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Fire
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Flying
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Ghost
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Grass
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Ground
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Ice
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Poison
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Psychic
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Rock
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Steel
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hidden Power Water
moves.description: Type is based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: Hyper Voice
moves.description: No additional effect.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.description: 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Ice Punch
moves.description: 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Icy Wind
moves.description: Lowers foe's Speed by 1 stage.

moves.name: Incinerate
moves.description: Removes the target's Berry.

moves.name: Iron Tail
moves.description: 30% chance to lower Defense by 1 stage.

moves.name: Knock Off
moves.description: Power is boosted 1.5x if user is holding a removable item. Removes the target's item.

moves.name: Last Resort
moves.description: Can only be used if all other moves have been used once.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.description: Lowers damage from special attacks for 5 turns.

moves.name: Lucky Chant
moves.description: Blocks critical hits for 5 turns.

moves.name: Magic Coat
moves.description: Bounces back certain non-damaging moves.

moves.name: Magical Leaf
moves.description: Ignores accuracy modifiers.

moves.name: Mega Kick
moves.description: No additional effect.

moves.name: Mega Punch
moves.description: No additional effect.

moves.name: Meteor Mash
moves.description: 20% chance to raise Attack by 1 stage.

moves.name: Metronome
moves.description: Picks a random move.

moves.name: Mimic
moves.description: Copies the last move used by the target.

moves.name: Minimize
moves.description: Boosts evasion by 2 stages.

moves.name: Misty Terrain
moves.description: For five turns, Grounded Pokemon cannot have major status problems or confusion inflicted on them by other Pokemon. Their Dragon-type moves are weakened by 50%.

moves.name: Moonblast
moves.description: Deals damage to one adjacent target with a 30% chance to lower its Special Attack by 1 stage.

moves.name: Moonlight
moves.description: Heals variably depending on the weather.

moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.description: Lowers accuracy by 1 stage.

moves.name: Natural Gift
moves.description: Power and type depends on the user's held Berry.

moves.name: Nightmare
moves.description: Does 1/4 of the target's max HP per turn to a sleeping target.

moves.name: Pound
moves.description: No additional effect.

moves.name: Power-Up Punch
moves.description: Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.

moves.name: Present
moves.description: Has random power and a chance to heal the target.

moves.name: Protect
moves.description: Prevents anything from working on the user that turn.

moves.name: Psych Up
moves.description: Copies the foe's stat changes.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: 10% chance to lower Special Defense 1 stage.

moves.name: Psyshock
moves.description: Damage is based on the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.description: Summons rain for 5 turns.

moves.name: Recycle
moves.description: Restores a used up item.

moves.name: Reflect
moves.description: Lowers damage from physical attacks for 5 turns.

moves.name: Rest
moves.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns and restores all HP.

moves.name: Retaliate
moves.description: Power doubles if the user's teammate fainted the previous turn.

moves.name: Return
moves.description: No additional effect.

moves.name: Rock Smash
moves.description: 50% chance to lower Defense by 1 stage.

moves.name: Role Play
moves.description: Copies the foe's ability and overwrites the user's ability.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.description: Doubles in power with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

moves.name: Round
moves.description: Power doubles if a teammate uses Round in the same turn.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.description: Blocks status conditions for 5 turns.

moves.name: Secret Power
moves.description: Effects vary with terrain.

moves.name: Seismic Toss
moves.description: Does damage equal to the user's level.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.description: 20% chance to lower Special Defense by 1 stage.

moves.name: Shock Wave
moves.description: Ignores accuracy modifiers.

moves.name: Signal Beam
moves.description: 10% chance to confuse.

moves.name: Sing
moves.description: Puts the target to sleep.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.description: Picks one of the user's moves at random. Can only be used while sleeping.

moves.name: Snatch
moves.description: If certain moves are used, the user of Snatch uses the moves instead.

moves.name: Snore
moves.description: Can only be used while sleeping. 30% chance to flinch.

moves.name: Soft-Boiled
moves.description: Heals 50% max HP.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.description: Charges up turn 1; attacks on turn 2.

moves.name: Splash
moves.description: No effect whatsoever.

moves.name: Stealth Rock
moves.description: Damages foe's switch-ins.

moves.name: Stored Power
moves.description: Varies in power depending on number of boosts accumulated by user.

moves.name: Strength
moves.description: No additional effect.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.description: Takes 1/4 the user's max HP to create a Substitute that takes damage for the user.

moves.name: Sunny Day
moves.description: Summons sun for 5 turns.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.description: Confuses the target. Boosts its Attack by 2 stages.

moves.name: Sweet Kiss
moves.description: Confuses the target.

moves.name: Telekinesis
moves.description: Lasts 3 turns and makes all moves hit the target.  Makes target immune to Ground-type moves.

moves.name: Thunder
moves.description: 30% chance to paralyze.

moves.name: Thunder Punch
moves.description: 10% chance to paralyze.

moves.name: Thunder Wave
moves.description: Paralyzes the foe.

moves.name: Thunderbolt
moves.description: 10% chance to paralyze.

moves.name: Tickle
moves.description: Lowers Attack and Defense by 1 stage.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.description: Inflicts intensifying poison on the target.

moves.name: Trick
moves.description: Switches items with the foe.

moves.name: Uproar
moves.description: Repeats for 2-5 turns. No Pokemon can sleep during these turns.

moves.name: Wake-Up Slap
moves.description: Double Base Power if used on a sleeping foe.

moves.name: Water Pulse
moves.description: 20% chance to confuse.

moves.name: Wish
moves.description: Heals 50% of max HP after 2 turns.

moves.name: Wonder Room
moves.description: Swaps Defense and Special Defense of all Pokemon.

moves.name: Work Up
moves.description: Boosts user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.

moves.name: Zen Headbutt
moves.description: 20% chance to flinch.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: Can infatuate Pokemon of opposite gender when struck and increases their wild encounter rate.

abilities.name: Friend Guard
abilities.description: Reduces damage done to a teammate by 25%.
